azurerm_kusto_database_principal.description: Manages Kusto / Data Explorer Database Principal

resource_group_name.description: Specifies the Resource Group where the Kusto Database Principal should exist. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

cluster_name.description: Specifies the name of the Kusto Cluster this database principal will be added to. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

database_name.description: Specified the name of the Kusto Database this principal will be added to. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

role.description: Specifies the permissions the Principal will have. Valid values include `Admin`, `Ingestor`, `Monitor`, `UnrestrictedViewers`, `User`, `Viewer`. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

type.description: Specifies the type of object the principal is. Valid values include `App`, `Group`, `User`. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

object_id.description: An Object ID of a User, Group, or App. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

client_id.description: The Client ID that owns the specified `object_id`. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

app_id.description: The app id, if not empty, of the principal.

email.description: The email, if not empty, of the principal.

fully_qualified_name.description: The fully qualified name of the principal.

name.description: The name of the Kusto Database Principal.

create.description: Used when creating the Kusto Database Principal.

update.description: Used when updating the Kusto Database Principal.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Kusto Database Principal.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Kusto Database Principal.
